alert.note: Alert for Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 29 at 5:25PM CST until November 29 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CST FOR CENTRAL SABINE PARISH... At 525 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Zwolle, or 29 miles north of Toledo Bend Dam, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Zwolle around 535 PM CST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
